title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 502.5 - Effect of compliance with the standards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 502.5 - Effect of compliance with the standards

State Regulations
A fallout shelter constructed in conformity with the
provisions of the regulations governing construction, maintenance and use of
fallout shelters shall, notwithstanding any provisions of law to the contrary, be deemed to comply with the applicable building code, Multiple Dwelling Law, Multiple Residence Law, or other law as defined in section
3
of the State

Defense Emergency Act relating to the construction, maintenance and use of
buildings, structures or other real property, and to the control of land
uses. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
502.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
